articles.title: Mass. curler helps U.S. reach first Olympic curling mixed doubles final
articles.description:
Southborough's Korey Dropkin and his partner, Cory Thiesse, guaranteed the U.S. its first Olympic medal in the mixed event after a 9-8 victory over Italy in a semifinal match.

The post Mass. curler helps U.S. reach first Olympic curling mixed doubles final appeared first on Boston.com.
